text: Philippe Moureaux (12 April 1939 – 15 December 2018) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Etterbeek, Belgium. He was a professor at Université libre de Bruxelles. He was the first and third Minister-President of the French Community from 1981 to 1985 and again in 1988. He was a member of the Parti socialiste. He was also mayor of Sint-Jans-Molenbeek. Moureaux died on 15 December 2018 in Brussels, Belgium from cancer, aged 79. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Belgium Category:Belgian academics Category:Belgian historians Category:Belgian mayors Category:Brussels-Capital Region politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:Socialist Party (Belgium) politicians Category:People from Brussels-Capital Region Category:Walloon politicians
title: Philippe Moureaux
